roadmap_data.summary: A 5-stage, project-driven path that takes learners from solid OpenCV fundamentals to deploying state-of-the-art vision models on edge devices. Emphasis is placed on reproducible experimentation, modern deep-learning workflows, and real-world deployment constraints.

stages.title: Core Foundations & Image Processing
stages.description: Refresh and deepen your grasp of digital images, color spaces, geometric transformations, and classic filters. Build a reusable image-processing toolkit that will accelerate later stages.
learning_objectives: Explain how images are stored and manipulated in memory (NumPy arrays vs. cv::Mat).
Implement histogram equalization, morphological operations, and frequency-domain filtering.
Profile and optimize OpenCV code with vectorization and multithreading.
stages.project_idea: Create a CLI utility that batch-enhances low-light smartphone photos (noise reduction + contrast + sharpening) and benchmarks speed on CPU vs. GPU.

stages.title: Feature Detection, Matching & Geometry
stages.description: Master robust local features, camera models, and two-view geometry to enable applications like panorama stitching and augmented reality.
learning_objectives: Compare SIFT, SURF, ORB, and learned features (e.g., SuperPoint) in terms of repeatability and speed.
Estimate homographies and fundamental matrices with RANSAC.
Calibrate a camera and remove radial distortion.
stages.project_idea: Build a mobile app that stitches 5–8 overlapping photos into a 180° panorama in <2 s on-device.

stages.title: Deep Learning for Recognition
stages.description: Transition from classical CV to modern CNNs. Learn transfer learning, data augmentation, and evaluation metrics for classification, detection, and segmentation.
learning_objectives: Fine-tune ResNet and EfficientNet on a custom 10-class dataset with ≥90% top-1 accuracy.
Train an SSD or YOLOv8 detector and interpret mAP, PR curves, and confusion matrices.
Implement a U-Net that segments road scenes into 19 classes with ≥0.75 mIoU.
stages.project_idea: Develop a web dashboard that ingests live traffic-camera feeds, detects vehicles, and counts them per lane, displaying real-time analytics.

stages.title: Advanced Architectures & Self-Supervised Learning
stages.description: Explore transformers, self-supervised pre-training, and multi-task learning to push accuracy and reduce labeled-data requirements.
learning_objectives: Train a Vision Transformer (ViT) from scratch on ImageNet-1k and compare convergence vs. ResNet.
Implement contrastive learning (SimCLR or MoCo v3) and evaluate linear-probe accuracy.
Design a multi-task network that jointly detects objects and estimates depth.
stages.project_idea: Build a few-shot product-recognition system for retail shelves: with only 5 images per SKU, achieve 95% retrieval accuracy using self-supervised features.

stages.title: Deployment & MLOps for Vision
stages.description: Convert trained models to efficient runtimes, monitor them in production, and update them over-the-air without downtime.
learning_objectives: Quantize and prune a segmentation model to <25 MB while maintaining ±1% mIoU.
Package the model behind a TensorRT or ONNX Runtime service with sub-100 ms latency on GPU.
Set up CI/CD with data drift detection and nightly re-training pipelines.
stages.project_idea: Deploy the traffic-counting model from Stage 3 onto a Jetson Nano. Stream 1080p video @30 fps, log counts to Prometheus, and trigger Slack alerts when congestion exceeds thresholds.
